Translations.Text: Siwa wid isellen, ara d ijawben. Lmegtin a ten id Issker Oebbi, sinna, $uoeS tu$alin nnsen
Qqaoen: "acimi ur as d irs ara ussekni s$uo Mass is"? Ini: "Oebbi, s tidep, Izmer a d Issers assekni", maca tegwti degsen ur eoin
Ur illi lweec di tmurt, ne$ ufrux ippafgen s wafriwen is, ur nelli d leoyus am kunwi. Ur Nestehza, di Tezmamt, $ef wacemma. Sinna, ar Mass nnsen, ad pwafessren
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, aaegen, gugmen, di tillas. Win i S ihwan i Oebbi, a t Itlef. Win i S ihwan, a t Iawi d ubrid uwqim
Ini: "twalam ma iusa kwen id uaaqeb n Oebbi, ne$ ma iusa kwen id yimir, day ar war Oebbi ara tnaaoem, ma tessawalem tidep
Xaii! £uoeS ara tnujem. Ad Issiferr ayen i$ef tnujem $uoeS, ma ihwa yaS, a ppeppum ayen tcurkem
Ni$ Nuzen ed ar leoyus, uqbel ik. Nesaadda fellasen tilufa, ccqa, amar ad eiwten
A lemmer eawten, mi ten id tusa tiyta nne£. Maca, qehoen wulawen nnsen. Cciian Icebbee asen ayen xeddmen
Mi ppun ayen i sen d smmektin, Nelli yasen tibbura n yal cci, armi, mi feoeen s wayen i sen ippunefken, Newwet iten, deqzalla. D$a qevaen layas
